Content.Name: Drop off -Pick up Info
Content.Title: Drop off -Pick up Info
Content.Abstract: This page reflects the schedule and includes a downloadable link to view the BYS Schedule.
Content.BodyCopy:
2012 SCHEDULE

Check in / Drop off and Pick up information for ALL participants!


Dress Code Specifics

Day One: Casual Dress Day
Approved shorts are okay, no "grubbies."

Day Two: T-shirt Day
You may wear jeans or approved shorts, but you must wear your BYS t-shirt. Your counselor will let you know the color prior to your arrival. Evening Pass holder will receive a shirt too.

Day Three: Sunday Best
Ties and dresses

All Housing Participants:

  • Check in on the North East side of Taco Bell Arena on the BSU Campus between 2:15 and 2:30 p.m. on DAY 1.
    • Pick up on DAY 3 is at 11:15 a.m. at the same place.
  • Parking is only for check in and pick up.
  • Meals are provided on the following days:
    • DAY 1 - dinner
    • DAY 2  - breakfast, lunch, and dinner
    • DAY 3 - breakfast

All Non-Housing Participants:

  • Check in at the BSU Administration parking lot-drop off and pick up parking only.
    • Drop off between 2:15 and 2:30 p.m. on DAY 1.
    • Pick up time is at the same location at 10:30 p.m.
    • DAY 2 drop off time is 8:15 a.m. and then pick up at 10:35 p.m.
    • DAY 3 drop off is at 8:45 a.m. and pick up is at 12:15 p.m.
    • Drop off parking is only allowable up to 7 minutes.
  • Meals are provided on the following days:
    • DAY 1 - dinner
    • DAY 2 - lunch and dinner

Evening/Saturday Only Participants:

  • Check in at the Jordan Ballroom-BSU Student Union building between 6:00 and 6:15 p.m. each night.
    • Your pick up ride should arrive promptly at 9:30 p.m. on Thursday and 9:45 p.m. on Friday.
    • On Saturday, you should be dropped off by 8:45 a.m. and picked up at 11:20 a.m. sharp.
      • If necessary, parking is available in the Lincoln Street Parking Garage.
      • Limited overnight and daytime parking is available at the LDS Church on Juanita and Boise Avenue.
Note:  No meals are provided for Evening/Saturday Only Participants.
